data: MDGNN Xu et al. (2024)
Multi-relational graph incorporating industry and institutional relationships
Hierarchical graph embedding with ALIBI positional encoding
Improvement in IC: 15% (CSI300) Stronger performance on larger datasets
MASTER Li et al. (2024b)
Dynamic modeling of stock correlation via alternating attention
Market-driven gating mechanism for feature selection
Ranking Metrics: +13% Portfolio Metrics: +47% (CSI300, CSI800)
DoubleAdapt Zhao et al. (2023)
Dual adaptation for distribution shifts in streaming data
Multi-head transformation layers for feature and label adaptation
Consistent improvement in LSTM, GRU, Transformer implementations Model-agnostic adaptability
DPA-STIFormer Yan and Tan (2024)
Feature-centric temporal modeling
Dual path mechanism with adaptive gating
Superior performance on CSI500, CSI1000, NASDAQ, NYSE Improvement in IC and Sharpe Ratio
DANSMP Zhao et al. (2022)
Executive-level market knowledge graph
Dual attention network for complex entity interactions
Returns: 16.97% Sharpe Ratio: 4.628 (CSI300E)
GINN Xu et al. (2024)
Integration of GARCH theory with neural networks
GARCH-based regularization in the LSTM loss function
Consistent performance across 7 global indices Strong zero-shot performance
DIFFSTOCK Daiya et al. (2024)
Diffusion models for market prediction
Adaptive noise scheduling for stock volatility
Improvement in Sharpe Ratio: NYSE: +7.92% NASDAQ: +6.18%
Wang et al. (2024b)
Integration of LLM for news processing
Text-based transformation of numerical prediction
Superior performance in event-driven market shifts Multi-domain applicability
